channel.title: Troubleshooting on Security365 Docs
channel.description: Recent content in Troubleshooting on Security365 Docs

item.title: Common error codes
item.description: Common error codesThe Cloudflare Load Balancing API adds global health to each pool and origin server. It also gives you a view into what our network sees at a wider level. Cloudflare uses a quorum system to determine pool and origin health status. The quorum is taken from PoPs responsible for running health checks in a region, and the majority result is used. When troubleshooting failures, use the Cloudflare API for programmatic access to Cloudflare Load Balancing.
